
```{r Setup, include = FALSE, results = 'hide', warning = FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

Sys.getenv("CENSUS_API_KEY")
```

```{r}
acs5_2018_vars <- load_variables(2018, "acs5", cache = TRUE)
```

```{r}
sex_age_vars <- acs5_2018_vars %>%
  slice(5:51)

sex_age_vec <- sex_age_vars %>%
  select(name) %>%
  unlist()

sex_age_label <- sex_age_vars %>%
  select(label) %>%
  unlist()
```

```{r, message = FALSE}
MI_sex_age_acs5_2018 <- get_acs(geography = "place",
              variables = sex_age_vec,
              place = "Manistee",
              state = "MI",
              year = 2018)

Manistee_sex_age_acs5_2018 <- MI_sex_age_acs5_2018 %>%
  slice(18425:18471) %>%
  mutate(sex_age_label = sex_age_label) %>%
  select(sex_age_label, estimate)
```
